Bases: todoist.managers.generic.Manager, todoist.managers.generic.AllMixin, todoist.managers.generic.GetByIdMixin, todoist.managers.generic.SyncMixin

object_type = 'project'¶
resource_type = 'projects'¶
add(name, **kwargs)[source]¶

Creates a local project object, and appends the equivalent request to the queue.

update(project_id, **kwargs)[source]¶

Updates a project remotely, by appending the equivalent request to the queue.

delete(project_ids)[source]¶

Deletes a project remotely, by appending the equivalent request to the queue.

archive(project_id)[source]¶

Marks project as archived remotely, by appending the equivalent request to the queue.

unarchive(project_id)[source]¶

Marks project as not archived remotely, by appending the equivalent request to the queue.

update_orders_indents(ids_to_orders_indents)[source]¶

Updates the orders and indents of multiple projects remotely, appending the equivalent request to the queue.
